/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -march=native -pedantic -Wextra -Wall -Wno-unused-parameter  -shared -Wl,-soname,polycrystal.cpython-37m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so -o ../../build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/neml/cp/polycrystal.cpython-37m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so CMakeFiles/polycrystal.dir/polycrystal_wrap.cxx.o -Wl,-rpath,"\$ORIGIN:\$ORIGIN/..:/home/mark/projects/neml/build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/neml" -flto ../../build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/neml/libneml.so -lblas -llapack -lblas -llapack
